DOC.criteria: Key Reflux least one target vein ; One follow symptom related TV : aching , throb , heaviness , fatigue , pruritus , night cramp , restlessness , generalize pain discomfort , swell ; CEAP classification C2 ( symptomatic ) C5 ; Key Current , regular use systemic anticoagulation ; Previous suspect deep vein thrombosis pulmonary embolus , active acute superficial thrombophlebitis , thrombophlebitis migrans ; Previous treatment laser radiofrequency ablation venous disease target vein segment ; Known hypercoagulable disorder ; Pregnant breast feed enrollment ; Known sensitivity cyanoacrylate adhesive ; Venous treatment contralateral limb within last 30 day , require contralateral treatment within three month ; Planned undergo additional ipsilateral treatment leg within 3 month follow treatment .
